    • Uses of BaseActivity in org.lestaxinomes.les_taxinomes_android.activities

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasePublicationActivity
      Common parent of all the activities of the "Publication" part
      class  ConsultationActivity
      Activity composed by : only the media list, if portrait the media list and the detail of the selected media, if landscape.
      class  FullScreenImageActivity
      Activity showing the media in full screen
      Needs an Intent with the StringExtra "mediaId"
      class  ImagePickActivity
      Allows to choose beetween Taking the picture through camera (done) or Loading an existing picture from the gallerie (not yet available)
      class  Login
      Login Form Allows user to log in Redirects to MyAccount if already loggued
      class  MapActivity
      Displays a map if "mediaId" StringExtra exists, centered on the media location else if GPS activated, centered on the current location of the user else centered on Brest and allows to load the closest medias of the center of the map (7 by 7)
      class  MyAccountActivity 
      class  PublicationFormActivity
